item.title: Day 1: Dev Environment Setup
item.description: VSCode configuration for Python, essential VSCode extensions and Python libraries ... and installing AI-focused libraries; an introduction to Jupyter notebooks and embedding that into VSCode. ** NOTE: Even if you are an experienced developer, you will benefit from the VSCode and AI libraries details. SIDEBAR: Beginning with the End in Mind (Our ultimate goal) - Preview/screenshot(s) of the Capstone project.

item.title: Day 10: TBD
item.description: Invoke a LLM using a chat-like prompt via its API. (Example: 'How would you go about designing a program that keeps itself updated as the underlying technology evolves.') This will be the outline we use to have AI help us build this. SIDEBAR: Local/open-source LLMs vs. commercial APIs. Things to think about for when we deploy (and need to pay for running) our AI applications in the real world.

item.title: Day 2: First AI App
item.description: Quick exercise to validate the functionality of the first Python/AI libraries, then we will create 'Hello AI', our first program demonstrating using AI APIs. SIDEBAR: Quick tour of the current state-of-the-art of the AI tooling landscape. RESOURCES: Links to related articles/videos.
